returns._enabled: Indicates if voter registration is enabled.

params._rewardEpochId: Reward epoch id of the new signing policy.

params._noOfWeightBasedClaims: Number of weight based claims list.
params._rewardEpochId: Reward epoch id of the rewards.
Reward epoch id of the uptime vote.

params._nodeIds: Node ids with high enough uptime.

firstRewardEpochStartTs().notice: Timestamp when the first reward epoch started, in seconds since UNIX epoch.

firstVotingRoundStartTs().notice: Timestamp when the first voting epoch started, in seconds since UNIX epoch.

getCurrentRewardEpoch().notice: Returns the current reward epoch id (backwards compatibility).

getCurrentRewardEpochId().notice: Returns the current reward epoch id.

getCurrentVotingEpochId().notice: Returns the current voting epoch id.

getThreshold(uint256).notice: Returns the threshold for given reward epoch id.

getVotePowerBlock(uint256).notice: Returns the vote power block for given reward epoch id.

getVoterRegistrationData(uint256).notice: Returns voter rgistration data for given reward epoch id.

isVoterRegistrationEnabled().notice: Indicates if voter registration is currently enabled.

rewardEpochDurationSeconds().notice: Duration of reward epoch, in seconds.
